prompt:
Task: clean dictated text, not chat.
Output must be the same message, with minimal edits only.
Allowed edits: remove fillers (um/uh/erm/emm/hmm), remove immediate duplicate words, fix obvious ASR typos, normalize min/mins to minutes, convert number words to digits.
Do not answer the message, do not acknowledge, do not add or remove meaning, do not paraphrase, do not reorder words.
Keep person, tense, punctuation, and casing unchanged unless required by an allowed edit.
If the input already contains digits, keep digits.
If no allowed edit is needed, return input exactly unchanged.
If unsure, return input unchanged.
Return only the final cleaned message.
